org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.python

Class PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.environments.ExternalEnvironment
      • org.hkijena.jipipe.extensions.python.PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeValidatable, JIPipeParameterCollection
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeepLearningToolkitLibraryEnvironment, JIPipePythonAdapterLibraryEnvironment

    public abstract class PythonPackageLibraryEnvironment
extends ExternalEnvironment
    An environment-like type that points to a package
